dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4066 IH: National Historic Vehicle Register Act of 2017

action.action-desc: Mr. Walberg (for himself and Mr. Lowenthal) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To establish a program to accurately document vehicles that were significant in the history of the United States, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Historic Vehicle Register Act of 2017.

paragraph.text: The term Register means the National Historic Vehicle Register established under subsection (b)(1).
The term Secretary means the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service.
The Secretary shall establish and maintain a register of historic vehicles, to be known as the National Historic Vehicle Register, which shall include, with respect to each vehicle on the Register—

subparagraph.text: a narrative describing the historic vehicle and the historical significance of that vehicle;
a photographic record of the historic vehicle; and
a line drawing or engineering drawing of the historic vehicle, as applicable.

paragraph.text: The Secretary shall coordinate with the Historic Vehicle Association, the American Motorcycle Heritage Foundation, and other appropriate organizations, as determined by the Secretary, to invite individual, institutional, and other owners of historic vehicles to participate in the Register.
The Register shall be archived in the Library of Congress.
The Secretary shall develop criteria for the inclusion of historic vehicles on the Register, in accordance with paragraph (2).
In developing criteria under this subsection, the Secretary shall take into consideration the following factors, as applied to a vehicle:

clause.text: A vehicle associated with an event that is important in automotive or United States history.
A vehicle associated with the life of an individual who is significant in automotive or United States history.

subparagraph.text: A vehicle that is distinctive based on—
A vehicle of a particular type that—

clause.text: was the first or last produced of that type; or
is among the most well-preserved or authentically restored examples of that type.

subsection.text: In carrying out this section, the Secretary may enter into contracts or cooperative agreements with the Federal Government, State governments, units of local government, public or private agencies, organizations, associations, institutions, corporations, other entities, or individuals for the purpose of sharing costs or services in carrying out authorized activities of the Secretary in administering the Register.

paragraph.text: supersedes any Federal, State, or local environmental or air quality standard relating to the operation of a motor vehicle or a historic vehicle;
violates the privacy of the owner of any historic vehicle; or
requires that a historic vehicle be documented without the consent of the owner.

subsection.text: No new appropriations shall be authorized to carry out this section.
